OwnerInformation.description: User-provided value that will be included in any CloudWatch events raised while running tasks for these targets in this Maintenance Window.

ResourceType.description: The type of target being registered with the Maintenance Window.

Targets.description: The targets (either instances or tags). Instances are specified using Key=instanceids,Values=<instanceid1>,<instanceid2>. Tags are specified using Key=<tag name>,Values=<tag value>.

WindowId.description: The ID of the Maintenance Window the target should be registered with.
